mapper.update: update dict set dict_type = #{dict_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtion = #{addtion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_uptime = #{last_uptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, dict_type, `name`, addtion, create_time, last_uptime from dict
